item.title: job003
item.description: Job alias: None Defocus per micrograph Max resolution per micrograph Defocus histogram Astigmatism histogram Max resolution histogram Defocus / Max resolution histogram Defocus / Figure of merit histogram Job command(s): 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 Executing new job on Tue May 25 15:30:00 2021 with the following command(s): which relion_run_ctffind_mpi --i MotionCorr/job002/corrected_micrographs.star --o CtfFind/job003/ --Box 512 --ResMin 30 --ResMax 5 --dFMin 5000 --dFMax 50000 --FStep 500 --dAst 100 --ctffind_exe /public/EM/ctffind/ctffind.
